root.name: We Sing: 80s
root.description: OverviewWe Sing: 80s is a karaoke game developed and published by Nordic Games for the Wii platform.GameplayWe Sing: 80s is a karaoke game in which players sing into USB microphones and try to match the pitch of the song. There are 30 songs to choose from in We Sing: 80s, all of course are from the 1980s.
